FILE: cm645830v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAQ - SINGAPORE
RIVALRY: RIV1242
DISPUTE(S): MID2785 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190311
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190311

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2785 

TERRMID: MID2785 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2785 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2785 from Gibler 2018, in 1987 Iraq attacked a Songaporean ship carrying oil from Iran. Iraq routinely attacked ships trading with Iran as a means of harming Iran's economy during the Iraq-Iran War. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a terriorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2785 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2785 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2785 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2785 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2785 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2785 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2785 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
